channel.title: Posts on SAMUELRUSSELL.NET
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SAMUELRUSSELL.NET

item.title: Resume Do's and Don'ts
item.description: In my current role as a senior software developer/team lead I get to look over a lot of resumes - from interns, to junior coders right up to very experienced devs. Over time you see a few repeating patterns that you really wish you wouldn’t. Most of them are pretty minor, in the scheme of things, but when you’re looking at dozens of resumes and you’re looking for ways to narrow the selection pool why put yourself in that company?

item.title: My First Hugo Post
item.description: Just going to leave this here for the time-being. Hugo is really super fast! Some Code sections var s = "JavaScript syntax highlighting"; alert(s); s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s No language indicated, so no syntax highlighting. But let's throw in a <b>tag</b>. 1 2 3 4 5 6 const canvas = document.querySelector('canvas'); const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); const width = canvas.width = window.innerWidth; const height = canvas.height = window.
